rows.label: bf08230100_0020
rows.name: I ate her.

rows.label: bf08230100_0025
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Adlib shock/surprise

rows.label: bf08230100_0030
rows.name:
I had no idea what
happened after we left...

rows.label: bf08230100_0040
rows.name:
Marveni feared the power
of the Holy Grail.

rows.label: bf08230100_0050
rows.name:
After Metsu's defeat, he tried to wipe
out all remaining traces of Iira.

rows.label: bf08230100_0060
rows.name:
But by then, you had
already disappeared.

rows.label: bf08230100_0070
rows.name:
Those of us left behind were
slaughtered mercilessly.

rows.label: bf08230100_0080
rows.name: [ML:undisp ][ML:Dash ][ML:Dash ]

rows.label: bf08230100_0090
rows.name:
No... Even if you weren't
there, they would have...

rows.label: bf08230100_0100
rows.name:
...humans would have
done exactly the same.

rows.label: bf08230100_0110
rows.name:
Chosen by God, eventually becoming Divine Beasts.
They feared us who would become the world itself.

rows.label: bf08230100_0120
rows.name: So that's the reason he attacked you.

rows.label: bf08230100_0130
rows.name: Saving the world? That's not it at all.

rows.label: bf08230100_0140
rows.name: His real reason for seeking Eden...

rows.label: bf08230100_0150
rows.name: ...is his desire for God's power.

rows.label: bf08230100_0155
rows.name:
He wants to erase all Blades and
Divine Beasts from existence.

rows.label: bf08230100_0160
rows.name:
So that's why he was taking care
of Rex and the Holy Grail...

rows.label: bf08230100_0170
rows.name: Even so!

rows.label: bf08230100_0180
rows.name: Even if that's true.

rows.label: bf08230100_0190
rows.name:
You're no different from him. You're
doing exactly the same thing.
